text.tspan: - Accounting entries depend on the nature of trade (Buy/ Sell/ Future/ Option etc.)
System can be parameterised (Interco Parameter) to book P&L on account of
customer fees and Taxes automatically in the Portfolio’s own Company
- For a multiple Customers in a Single Trade, Customer Commission/
fees and Taxes can be booked on a pro-rata basis
- Similarly, system can be parameterised to reinvoice Broker fees and Taxes

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal; fill: black;
text.tspan: MT601 - for Precious metal FX option

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; font-weight: normal; fill: black;
